comments.body:
```suggestion
hesitate to ask questions on our various channels, submit issues or create new
```

I did comment on this in a couple of places, but maybe it's my bad knowledge of the English language. Do we need a coma before `and` or `or` ?

Welcome to the oxford comma debate. https://www.grammarly.com/blog/oxford-comma-debate/

In short, both are correct üòÜ
